name: Elvis Presley & The Soccer Balls of Time
name_original: Elvis Presley & The Soccer Balls of Time
description:
Game Jam Prompt: 10 Seconds


Play as Elvis Presley trying to kick ten soccer balls before the timer goes above 10... Or below zero! 
Each time you kick a soccerball, depending on its color, the timer switches between counting up and counting down. 

The music reverses while time is counting down!
